Text: It's damn sure not English. Could you guys please designate a language to these torrents, PLEASE. I hate when I download something and then can't watch the damn thing. There are no subs to this one either. But the movie it self is Great AS far as V. I give it a 10, it's very clear. I just don't speak what ever language it is in
oh, and thanks to all you guys who put in the time and work to get these on here.
